content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) transferring iron plates from the furnace to the wooden chest.
- Wooden Chest at position (2.5, 0.5) for collecting iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (4.5, 0.5) intended to transfer items but currently waiting for source items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place entities. For example, attempting to place a burner inserter failed due to lack of inventory.

### Errors when crafting without required ingredients
- Verify you have all required ingredients before crafting. Crafting transport belts failed due to missing iron plates.

### Errors when connecting entities improperly
- Use appropriate entities to connect items. Belts cannot be connected directly from a wooden chest; use an inserter to transfer items from the chest to the belt.

### Errors when placing entities in occupied positions
- Check that the target position is free before placing an entity. Attempting to place a burner inserter failed because the position was already occupied.

### Errors when inserting items without inventory
- Ensure you have the items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. Attempting to insert coal failed due to lack of coal in inventory.
